name: Effie's Journey
description:
Effie's Journey is a small cow adventure game about new developed powers and the freedom that comes with them.

The project was created as part of the 16 Days RPG Maker RTP Game Jam. Therefore it's created with the RPG Maker 2003 using only the standart assets.

There is no ending build in the game so if you feel there is nothing more to see you probably have seen everything. The project is more like a showcase of some real time mechanics that are possible with the rpg maker 2003.
